subject: Olympic Games (2020)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Organizers made sure to include baseball and karate because they are important to Japan, in addition to surfing, skateboarding and sports climbing, which meet the International Olympic Committee’s call that additional sports have a strong youth appeal.
